title: Want to see Kishwer Merchant, Suyyash Rai on Nach Baliye? Hereâ€™s an update | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Want to see Kishwer Merchant, Suyyash Rai on Nach Baliye? Hereâ€™s an update 
TV actors Kishwer Merchant and Suyyash Rai have confirmed that they still have not given their yes to being a part of the eighth season of Nach Baliye. tv Updated: Feb 22, 2017 17:03 IST HT Correspondent Hindustan Times Kishwer Merchant and Suyyash Rai have still not said yes to being a part of Nach Baliye.(HTâ€‰Photo) 
For all their fans who wanted to see newly-weds Kishwer Merchant and Suyyash Rai together on TVagain, this will not be good news. Read more The complete story: How SuKish met and fell in love! 
The couple, who tied the knot in December 2016, was expected to take part in the latest season of Nach Baliye. However, Kishwer has made it clear with a tweet on Tuesday that they are indeed in talks for the project but still have not said yes to it. For all those asking..We were in talks but no we are not doing #NachBaliye8 ğŸ˜Š Gmrng pplğŸ˜ off to shoot today after a long time #filmcity ğŸ˜ â€” Kishwer M Rai (@KishwerM) February 21, 2017 
â€œFor all those asking..We were in talks but no we are not doing #NachBaliye8,â€ she wrote on Tuesday evening. 
Kishwer and Suyyash rose to fame in 2015 for being a part of the ninth season of Bigg Boss. Kishwer Merchant and Suyyash Rai on Bigg Boss. (Colors) 
Nach Baliye is a dance reality show on Star Plus where celebrity couples fight it out to be crowned the best dance partners. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
